txt.en:
'Tell me, [placeholder], would you be interested in helping me? Unfortunately, this undertaking would have you leave the island again. But I have no doubt you can find your way back! It may also have you travelling to far-off lands, some of which may be a difficult journey. The more experienced a traveller you are, the easier it should be, I think.

'What I need is more people like Ikhajât, going out into the world and finding others who might want to visit Furtherholm. Someone to help spread the word that this is a wonderful place to visit and all are welcome here!

'I have some specific places in mind where you could go to find people who might need a holiday in a warm and friendly place that has many good wines! In fact, I have made a list! Would you like to see it?'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
'Ah, [placeholder], you return to me! I hear that you were successful and brought us another visitor to the island. That is wonderful! I knew I could count on you! Here is a reward for your trouble.'
At Khâtaphos' request, you have gone to a location on his list and successfully promoted Furtherholm. You should return to him inside The Cracked Flagon to claim your reward.
Khâtaphos needs more people willing to travel Middle-earth to spread the word about Furtherholm and attract more guests.
Captain Khâtaphos has made a list of places he would like someone to visit and promote Furtherholm. You should pick a location to go to.
TBD Complete Quest: Recruiting in Forochel
